about.title: About us
about.description: We create unforgettable living experiences by combining the comfort of modern apartments with personal service and an honest approach to business.

seo.title: About us - Volshebno Tut
seo.description: Volshebno Tut - a team of professionals since 2020. Over 2500 satisfied guests, rating 4.9/5. Honesty, quality and care for every guest.

achievements.title: Our achievements and ratings
achievements.subtitle: Numbers that speak about our experience and service quality

story.title: Our story
story.description: How we came to create a comfortable apartment rental service
story.content1: It all started with a simple idea: to make short-term accommodation rental honest, transparent and truly comfortable. We ourselves traveled often and faced disappointment when reality did not match expectations.
story.content2: In 2020, we decided to create a service that would solve these problems. We started with careful selection of apartments, honest photography and implementation of quality standards that guarantee an excellent experience for every guest.
story.content3: Today Volshebno Tut is a team of professionals that continues to grow and develop, remaining true to its principles of quality and honesty.

quote.text: We believe that every journey should start with a comfortable and safe place where you can feel at home.
quote.author: — Anastasia Bezborodova, founder of Volshebno Tut
